{
    "cardType": "physical",
    "label": "Meal Card",
    "accountId": "{{accountId}}",
    "currency": "USD",
    "limitAmount": "120.00",
    "limitInterval": "allTime",
    "billingAddress": {
        "addressType": "billing",
        "line1": "164 Sugarloaf Drive",
        "line2": "",
        "city": "San Mateo",
        "state": "CA",
        "country": "US",
        "postalCode": "94403"
    },
    "shipping": {
        "shippingAddress": {
            "addressType": "shipping",
            "line1": "164 Sugarloaf Drive",
            "line2": "",
            "city": "San Mateo",
            "state": "CA",
            "country": "US",
            "postalCode": "94403"
        }
    },
    "allowedCategories": [
        "1234",
        "9878"

    "bin": "credit",
    "embossingPerson": "John Doe",

}
